Flux is an entirely cloud based system that
is accessible from any device, anywhere in
the world, at any time. The system
synchronises in real time; if you add a sale
on your mobile device everyone in the
office will see their screens update to reflect
the sale immediately. We also offer Flux as a
local server based system if customers
prefer to host the system locally.
KPI’s in real time in the

purchase them, they are a sunk
cost. Flux is different - the core
Additionally, we have found that once
companies get access to a digitised version
of their processes and data they rapidly
develop new ways of doing things. Users
know more about their company than ever
before, and catch problems when they start
rather than at the end of a reporting period.
This leads them to suggest process
system reviews to see where the Flux
system can be further tailored for customer
needs. This enables users to change the
system to suit their changing business
needs – a large departure from traditional,
static ERP systems. Flux’s modular software
processes can be added quickly with no
Flux is based on the concept that a fully
worker engagement and harmony. All user
activity is monitored in real time with user
reports helping you identify your best team
members and those who require extra
becomes the norm. Freed from mundane
tasks and empowered by easy real time
access to all relevant company data, staff
If required you can also share analytics &
data with your customers via the web

company began to grow rapidly. By 2013,
